Special Offer for Cargo Aircraft Operators!

Here are three integrated offerings that will help you address challenges by enabling data-based decisions in real time. More importantly, you can get all three solutions listed here now—but not pay for subscription fees in 2020:
- Cockpit Connectivity with Aspire <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/products/satellite-communications/aspire-400-satellite-communications-system]]> - Wireless Transfer with An Aircraft Data Gateway <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/services/maintenance-and-service-plans/aircraft-data-gateway]]> - Data Analytics with Honeywell Forge <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/connected-aircraft/airlines]]>

Let us know if you’d like to take advantage of our 2020 subscription waiver offer. Simply reply to get your airline on the list—it’s a limited-time offer. Reply now to get started! <[[mailto:Krasimir.Koychev@Honeywell.com?Subject=Special Cargo Offer 2020]]>
